alert.note: Alert for Charlotte; Halifax (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 2:36AM EST until January 13 at 1:36AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia... Pigg River Near Pigg River affecting Pittsylvania County. Roanoke (Staunton) River At Brookneal affecting Campbell, Charlotte and Halifax Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Virginia... Roanoke River At Roanoke affecting Roanoke, City of Roanoke and City of Salem independent cities. Roanoke (Staunton) River at Randolph affecting Charlotte and Halifax Counties. For the Roanoke River...including Roanoke, Pigg River, Brookneal, Randolph...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Roanoke (Staunton) River at Randolph. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, Water starts to reach base of Randolph Post Office. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 22.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 21.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 28.8 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 28.7 feet on 10/13/2018. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 215 PM EST.
